ooC: I think I know why Ellen is having problems, she tells me her 
sister and her share the same email address or something. I sent her 
an email with instructions, but i was informed that it got deleted or 
something. So I sent another, and since Ellen hasn't replied, and it 
posting on the messageboard, I'm lead to believe that the second 
email also got deleted. (typing up a nice two page practice post, 
along with tips, pointers, and suggestions as well gets irritating if 
you have to do it several times. =) Regardless, I'll put some 
instructions here.

Ellen (or Sarah?), go to http://mail.yahoo.com and sign up for a 
yahoo email address. After you've done that, log in, and send me a 
confirmation email to show that you've signed up. After that, I'll 
give you further training, and instructions.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> OOC: There is something illegal there. 3 can't be at two places at 
the

> Ellen, I suggest you divide your posts in two, a part of 
description 
> of your char's actions and a part quoting your char. It'll be 
clearer 
> this way. =)
> 
> Also, I hope it was you, Ellen. If it was another "hacker", there 
will
